document_data.name: House Serrat
document_data.mainbody: '''House Serrat''' was a large merchant clan from [[Delzimmer]] that was best known for controlling trade in the drug [[terazul]].{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|642}} Strictly speaking, the family wasn't noble as Delzimmer had no nobility. The family was considered a second-tier merchant house, below the Four Families who ruled Delzimmer.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|609}}
document_data.Religion: House Serrat's patron [[deity]] was the goddess [[Waukeen]].{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|1403}}
document_data.Ethics: House Serrat was somewhat [[neutral]] in ethical outlook.  Although the clan was loyal to its members and retainers the family was not above employing spies and enforcers against its rivals.  The family's main source of wealth was trade in the drug terazul, although they informed users of its side effects.  The family was also known for operating gambling houses.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|510}}
document_data.Notable Members:
*[[Alaia Serrat]]: Leader of the Travelers
*[[Julen Serrat]]: Ramul's youngest son and trainee in the Guardians
*[[Ramul Serrat]]: Leader of the Guardians and Alaia's brother
*[[Zaltys Serrat]]: Alaia's adopted daughter
document_data.Notable Employees:
*[[Glory]]: [[Tiefling]] [[psionics|psionicist]]
*[[Krailash]]: [[Dragonborn]] head of security for the Travelers.
*[[Quelamia]]: [[Eladrin]] [[Wizard]]
